Name: German
description:
German wants to take out another loan. He is 44 years. He is married and lives with his wife and children.

He wants this loan in order to buy supplies, fertilisers and manures for his sugar cane crops, and thereby offer his customers a higher-quality product. German hopes that this investment will give his family a higher quality of life and more financial stability. He can then continue to grow as a person and small-time businessperson.

This is Germanâ€™s second loan from FUDECOSUR. German has not received other loans from state banks. FUDECOSUR has provided this loan with better facilities and much lower interest rates.
